articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of LPRP
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of LPRP
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message of greeting from Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) and president of Laos, on Sept. 12.
					 He in his message extended warm congratulations and best wishes to Kim Jong Un, the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, all its members and the fraternal people of the DPRK on behalf of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, all its members, the people of Laos and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the WPK (October 10, 1945- October 10, 2013).
					
					 He noted with great pleasure that the fraternal people of the DPRK have registered great successes in carrying out the cause of safeguarding socialism and building it and further improving the people's living standard, holding the banner of the Juche idea and Songun, under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the great leaders of the Korean people, and the WPK led by Kim Jong Un for 68 years.
					
					 He expressed hope that the WPK and the people of the DPRK, under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, would achieve greater and fresh successes in accomplishing the cause of defending the country, building a thriving socialist nation and contributing to the peace, friendship and cooperation in the region and the rest of the world by achieving the peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 He expressed the wish to see the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties, the two governments and the two peoples continue to grow stronger.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and great success in the accomplishment of his noble cause.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Messages, Letters from Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Messages, Letters from Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages and letters from different countries on the occasions of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership and the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The messages and letters were sent by the chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus and the president of the Socialist Party of Benin.
					
					 They were also sent to Kim Jong Un by dignitaries of political, social and business circles and representatives of international organizations, organizations for the study of the Juche idea and organizations for supporting Korea's reunification and friendship with DPRK.
					
					 They included a member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist), vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran, secretary of the Central Committee of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana, director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, councillor of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea and those in Russia, Nepal, Malaysia, Pakistan, Kazakhstan, Iran, India, Japan, Norway, Romania, Bulgaria, Belarus, Switzerland, Sweden, France, Britain and Nigeria.
					
					 In the messages and letters they said that the exploits President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by leading the great anti-Japanese war to a victory to accomplish the historic cause of national liberation and making an immortal contribution to the prosperity of the country would shine forever.
					
					 They stressed that the beaming image of Kim Jong Il, who put the dignity and national power of Juche Korea on the highest level with his unique Songun revolutionary leadership, is always remembered by mankind along with the Day of Songun (August 25).
					
					 They expressed the belief that only victory and glory would be in store for the Korean people holding Kim Jong Un, another illustrious commander, in high esteem.

articles.title: Congratulations to Cambodian PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Cambodian PM
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the Cabinet of the DPRK, sent a message to Hun Sen on Wednesday to congratulate him upon his reappointment as prime minister of Cambodia.
					 Expressing belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger to meet the desire and interests of the peoples of the two countries, the message wished the prime minister bigger success in his responsible work for the national development and prosperity.

articles.title: Birthday of PRC Marked
articles.content:
Birthday of PRC Marked
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association gave a reception at the Okryu Restaurant Thursday to celebrate the 64th anniversary of the People's Republic of China (PRC).
					 Present there on invitation were the visiting delegation of the China-Korea Friendship Association led by Chairman Wu Donghe, Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai, and his embassy officials.
					
					 Minister of Public Health Kang Ha Guk, chairman of the C.C., the DPRK-China Friendship Association, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned were also present.
					
					 Kang Ha Guk said in his speech that the foundation of the PRC was the historical event which brought a radical turn to the life of the Chinese people. 
					
					 He referred to the fact that the Chinese people have achieved successes in the efforts to embody the spirit of the 18th congress of the party and attain the goal for economic construction under the 12th five-year plan under the leadership of the Communist Party of China with Xi Jinping as general secretary.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever make efforts to boost the DPRK-China friendship, common treasure of the peoples of the two countries, he added. 
					
					 Liu Hongcai said in his speech that the DPRK is achieving progress in the work for economic development and improving the standard of people's life under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by First Secretary Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The Chinese people are pleased that the fraternal Korean people achieve successes in the building of a thriving socialist nation, he noted. 
					
					 The two countries linked by the same mountain and rivers have a long history of friendship, he said, expressing the belief that the China-DPRK friendship will be everlasting in the future, too.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the China-Korea Friendship Association led by Chairman Wu Donghe visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues in deep reverence for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who made immortal contributions to the development of the DPRK-China friendship and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The delegation arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Mongolian Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Mongolian Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Mongolian government economic trade delegation headed by Khaltmaa Battulga, minister of Industry and Agriculture, flew back on Thursday after taking part in the 9th meeting of the economic, trade, scientific and technological consultative committee between the governments of the DPRK and Mongolia.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Soccer Team Beats Jordanian Rival
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Soccer Team Beats Jordanian Rival
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The league matches for the 2013 AFC U-16 Women's Championship began in Nanjing of China on Thursday. 
					12 teams will compete in the league matches, divided into 4 groups. The four top teams in each group will advance into semi-finals. 
					
					The DPRK, Taipei of China and Jordan belong to Group B. 
					
					The DPRK team trounced the Jordanian rival 6:0 in its first match on Thursday. 
					
					The DPRK team will meet the team of Taipei of China next Monday.

articles.title: DPRK Wrestling Champion Warmly Welcomed by Pyongyang Citizens
articles.content:
DPRK Wrestling Champion Warmly Welcomed by Pyongyang Citizens
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Yun Won Chol, a wrestler of the DPRK, returned home after winning a gold medal in the 2013 World Wrestling Championship held in Hungary.
					 He held the title in the Greco-roman 55kg class by defeating all his rivals with technical and tactical advantages.
					
					 He proved successful in the international wrestling tournament "Dan Kolov-Nikolai Petrov" and the 2013 Asian Wrestling Championship this year.
					
					 In the meantime, DPRK wrestler So Sim Hyang took the third place in the women's 51kg freestyle event.
					
					 Pyongyang Railway Station was in welcome mood Thursday to greet them.
					
					 The wrestlers were warmly welcomed by Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade who serves as chairman of the Wrestling Association of the DPRK, Colonel General of the Korean People's Army O Kum Chol and officials concerned and sportspersons.
					
					 Sportspersons put fragrant garlands around the necks of Yun and his coach and presented them with bunches of flowers, warmly congratulating them on their success.
					
					 Pyongyang citizens welcomed and congratulated Yun, who had the flag of the DPRK hoisted in a foreign country, in streets and from balconies of their houses.
					
					 He visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and placed bunches of flowers before them to pay tribute.

articles.title: Pyongyang Int'l Trade Fair Enjoys Popularity
articles.content:
Pyongyang Int'l Trade Fair Enjoys Popularity
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The 9th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair is going on with attendance of many foreign companies.
					 Among them is the Beijing Bridge International Trading Company Ltd. of Germany, which has been strange to Korea. The company, founded in Juche 97 (2008), engages itself in sale of Germany-made foodstuffs and electronic appliances in China.
					
					 Noting that he had long wanted to visit the DPRK and know much about it, Matthias Vogt, general manager of the company, told KCNA:
					
					 Here I came to feel that the DPRK people are very kind and polite and everything is stable. 
					
					 It is hard in my country to get information about the Korean market.
					
					 I was told in Beijing about this fair two months ago, and now I am here with home-made foodstuffs such as wine, beer, carbonated water and vitamin sweets. It's my belief that these quality and cheap products with a history of 100 years will take up a big market in the DPRK.
					
					 Markets are different in each country, and your market is large and in good order with many products. I hope that Germany and the DPRK would become closer in friendship and economic and trade ties.
					
					 I will come here again with more goods.

articles.title: National Farm Machine Exhibition and Meeting of Inventors Held
articles.content:
National Farm Machine Exhibition and Meeting of Inventors Held
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- A national farm machine exhibition and meeting of inventors took place at the Institute for Agricultural Mechanization of the Academy of Agricultural Science from Tuesday to Thursday.
					 Presented there were more than 260 pieces of farm machines of dozens of kinds and their spare parts and jigs invented and manufactured by officials, scientists, technicians and workers in the field of agriculture through scientific research and mass technological innovation movement.
					
					 Drew attention of visitors were deep layer plough, well-nourished cold-bed rice seedling transplanter, rice and maize thrashers and various other thrashers and video showing the process of farm machine production.
					
					 At the exhibition the Institute was placed top while Pyongyang City came in first, South Hwanghae and South Phyongan provinces second and South Hamgyong and North Hwanghae provinces and Nampho City third.
					
					 Swapped at the meeting were experiences gained in the course of inventing and introducing farm machines conducive to the development of the nation's agriculture. The meeting also discussed scientific and technological issues.
					
					 A closing ceremony took place Thursday.

articles.title: Yun I Sang Concert Closes
articles.content:
Yun I Sang Concert Closes
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The 32nd Yun I Sang concert was closed.
					 A closing concert was given at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall on Thursday.
					
					 Among the audience were officials concerned, creators, artistes, teachers and students in the central art troupes and field of art education, Pyongyang citizens, overseas compatriots and foreign guests.
					
					 The concert began with soprano "Pyongyang Is Best." Put on the stage were such numbers as orchestra "Dance Music" and symphonic poem "Angel in Flames" composed by Yun and other music pieces.
					
					 The concert gave deep impressions to the audience with tested depiction and beautiful melody.
					
					 The repertoire of the second day performance given earlier included various numbers like intermezzo for cello and piano and op 4 of string quartet composed by Yun I Sang.

articles.title: Mosaics Depicting Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu Erected in Various Units
articles.content:
Mosaics Depicting Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu Erected in Various Units
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Mosaics depicting smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us" and "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" were erected with due ceremonies in Jangyon and Samchon counties of South Hwanghae Province, and Hoeyang and Changdo counties of Kangwon Province and Thosan, Yonthan and Phyongsan counties of North Hwanghae Province.
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il indicated the way to be followed by Jangyon and Samchon counties while providing field guidance to them.
					
					 Hoeyang and Changdo counties are also associated with their undying leadership feats.
					
					 They led the work in those counties with deep care to establish the sub-workteam management system so that they might develop agriculture, improve the people's living standard and spruce up well county seats and ris.
					
					 Kim Jong Il opened a bright prospect for radically changing the appearance of land as befitting socialist Korea while giving on-site guidance to Taebaek-ri, Changdo county in May, Juche 87 (1998).
					
					 They also guided overall work in Thosan, Yonthan and Phyongsan counties to make sure that a turning point was brought about in it.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Authorities for Painting Themselves as Humanitarians
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Authorities for Painting Themselves as Humanitarians
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime is disguising itself as an angel of humanitarianism all of a sudden after the postponement of the reunion of separated families and their relatives.
					 The conservative group is slandering the DPRK, vociferating about "action for seeking the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang by hurting separated families" and "act of violating moral laws". It is also becoming so crafty as to conduct a hypocritical farce of "expressing consolation to separated families."
					
					 This is a false propaganda to mislead public opinion in a bid to justify its crimes such as impairing the validity of the steps taken by the DPRK and blocking the progress made in the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The DPRK was compelled to postpone the reunion of separated families and their relatives scheduled to take place on the Harvest Moon Day. This was entirely attributable to the intolerable situation where the group is abusing the efforts of the DPRK to mend the inter-Korean relations and its will for dialogue for the purpose of confrontation.
					
					 It is nonsensical for the group to talk about humanitarianism in view of such grave situation.
					
					 All inter-Korean humanitarian undertakings were conducted thanks to the DPRK's positive initiative and efforts, not by any action of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 Most of the humanitarian undertakings in south Korea were conducted by civilian organizations and individual businessmen at a "NGO level". The south Korean authorities have always sat on the fence, vociferating about what they called "principle". This is the fact which no one can deny if one is informed of the inter-Korean relations even a bit.
					
					 The agreement was reached between the north and the south on the humanitarian issue including the reunion of separated families and their relatives recently thanks to the positive efforts of the DPRK.
					
					 It is worth recalling under what situation the DPRK proposed the talks between authorities of the north and the south including the normalization of operation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone, resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang and reunion of separated families and their relatives in June. The legacies of the June 15 era of reunification were ruthlessly trampled down due to the grave challenges of the anti-reunification forces and the puppet group totally denied the DPRK's proposal for creating an atmosphere for mending the inter-Korean relations through the holding of the June 15 joint event while resorting to acts of alluring and abducting DPRK's youngsters.
					
					 However, the DPRK pushed ahead with the dialogue between authorities of the north and the south out of broad magnanimity including such humanitarian issues as the reunion of separated families and their relatives and unreservedly and promptly settled all the issues proposed by the south side in the course of dialogue, irrespective of the situation.
					
					 The conservative forces, however, have resorted to the tactics of delaying the dialogue, asserting that the present inter-Korean relations are something like "tangled skeins" so that it is necessary to unreel them one by one before settling all matters at once and the like.
					
					 As regards fruits yielded by the hard-won  north-south dialogue, they made a mockery of their dialogue partner, claiming "it is a result of their confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" and "a fruition of their theory of principle" and the like, a behavior of drawing water to their own mill. Not content with staging the drills of "striking the north beyond the military demarcation line", an indication of their open war scenario against the north, they undisguisedly staged a farce of "appointing governors" of the provinces of the DPRK. They went the lengths of blatantly hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 It is no other than the south Korean puppet forces which have abused the north-south dialogue for inciting confrontation and totally derailed the process for inter-Korean reconciliation and cooperation including the humanitarian issue through a racket of confrontation of the social systems.
					
					 No matter how hard the anti-reunification confrontation forces try to wear the veil of humanitarianism, they can never conceal their true colors as anti-reunification and confrontation maniacs with daggers hidden under their belts.
					
					 They will never be able to evade their responsibility for the prevailing situation.

articles.title: Dialogue Can Never Go with War Racket: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Dialogue Can Never Go with War Racket: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will make positive efforts for mending the inter-Korean relations but cannot sit face to face with those trying hard to hurt it with arms, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 The south Korean authorities are talking a lot about "dialogue" but, in actuality, have gone mad with the smear campaign and war maneuvers against the DPRK in league with foreign forces, paying lip-service to dialogue, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that the puppet warmongers staged large-scale Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises targeting the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. in August last.  What merits a serious attention is that they unhesitatingly staged a drill of making a nuclear strike at the DPRK after introducing B-52H nuclear strategic bombers as part of the war maneuvers. Die-hard warmongers such as traitor Kim Kwan Jin malignantly slandered the DPRK, trumpeting about "a precedent of the north's provocation while dialogue was under way" and "nuclear and missile threats from the north".
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south can hardly be conducted under the present situation where the puppet regime of south Korea is misjudging the self-restraint of the DPRK and deliberately escalating the tensions while abusing the north-south dialogue for military provocations.
					
					 Dialogue can never go with war racket. Facts go to prove that the stumbling block lying in the way of mending the inter-Korean relations is a product of the south Korean puppet authorities' policy for confrontation with the DPRK and military provocations as they are abusing dialogue for confrontational racket, going against the trend of the times.
					
					 The more desperate the puppet authorities become in their confrontation with the DPRK, the further the inter-Korean relations will be deteriorated and the more seriously the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula be threatened. If they escalate confrontation despite the DPRK's warnings, the inter-Korean relations can never be repaired.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Denounced for Killing Inhabitant Coming Over to DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Denounced for Killing Inhabitant Coming Over to DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago a south Korean inhabitant in his 40s was ruthlessly shot to death by the puppet army soldiers. He tried to come over to the northern half of Korea by swimming across the River Rimjin in Phaju City, Kyonggi Province of south Korea.
					 It was said that he made up his mind to come over to the north with the resolve to find a way out. Finding it hard to live in south Korea he roamed about foreign countries including Japan. But as those countries declined to offer him an asylum he went back to south Korea and finally he decided to come over to the north.
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued information bulletin No. 1043 Thursday which said: 
					
					 The regime is made up of barbarians in human form as they ruthlessly killed the bare-handed innocent inhabitant who tried to enter the northern half of Korea in quest of a way of living.
					
					 Worse still, when the truth about the case was disclosed only to stir up a big furor, the regime raised such lame excuses as "non-compliance" and "flight". It is also hell-bent on the smear campaign against the DPRK, labeling him a "north's spy who attempted to defect to the north". 
					
					 For fear of denunciation at home and abroad against its brutal atrocity, the regime has not opened to public the real address and name of the man.
					
					 It is the height of shamelessness that the regime is trumpeting about "human rights" and "ethnics" of someone when it is trying to justify the shuddering killing and abuse him for escalating confrontation with the north by labeling him a "spy of the north".
					
					 The puppet authorities should thoroughly probe the truth about the merciless killing of the innocent inhabitant and sternly punish those involved in it.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Suppressing Pro-Reunification Patriotic Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Suppressing Pro-Reunification Patriotic Forces
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Recently the south Korean puppet regime has become evermore desperate in its racket of "eliminating the forces following the north" by deliberately linking the just activities of the democratic forces in south Korea with the DPRK under the pretexts of what it called plotted rebellion case, pro-north organization, etc.
					 As regards the situation, the DPRK took a resolute measure of putting off the scheduled reunion of separated families and relatives and north-south talks for the resumption of tour of Mt. Kumgang until a normal atmosphere is created for dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 Far from feeling responsibility for it, the south Korean puppet authorities are deteriorating the situation, talking such rubbish as "interference in internal affairs", a behavior of a guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 The spokesman for the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) in its statement on Thursday vehemently denounced the south Korean puppet regime for chilling the atmosphere of improvement in the north-south relations provided with much efforts and quelling the desire of the compatriots, a crime against nation, democracy and reunification.
					
					 The fascist behavior of the south Korean conservative group to eliminate all the people calling for achieving reconciliation with compatriots and realizing unity of Koreans in the idea of "By our nation itself" can not be construed otherwise than its evil-minded intention to make showdown to the last with all the patriotic forces struggling for the reunification, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 It amounts to a total denial of the declaration agreed upon between the north and the south to incriminate the above-said forces for supporting the declaration and calling for its implementation.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities should clarify whether they support the declaration or not before paying lip-service to "confidence-building".
					
					 Any "confidence" away from respect for the declaration and its implementation admits of no argument.
					
					 Never to be allowed is the revival of the fascist dark age, the period of "yusin" dictatorship, when anyone who merely talked about reunification was put behind the bars and executed.
					
					 The traitorous regime, which turns away from reunification with its back turned on the nation, will never be able to escape severe punishment by all the compatriots and shameful ruins.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Slammed for Its Moves for Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Slammed for Its Moves for Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Korean National Economic Workers in China released a statement on September 23 denouncing the south Korean puppet conservative group for abusing inter-Korean dialogue for confrontation.
					 The statement accused the group of mocking at the good will, magnanimity and sincere efforts of the DPRK and insulting them, claiming that a series of achievements made in the inter-Korean relations are a fruition of its "theory of principle".
					
					 It noted: The group is getting hell-bent on the moves for a war against the DPRK in league with its American master while crying out for "unification under liberal democracy" behind the scene of dialogue. Moreover, it is frantically intensifying the suppression of progressive pro-democracy forces, deliberately linking the case of attempted rebellion with the DPRK.
					
					 The statement recalled that under the prevailing grave situation the spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a statement declared that the DPRK would postpone the reunion of separated families and their relatives till the normal atmosphere for dialogue and negotiations is created and that it would take decisive and resolute countermeasures against the south Korean puppet group's ever-more undisguised moves for a war against it. It fully supported the stand taken by the committee.
					
					 It urged the group to make an apology for the crimes committed against the nation and stop at once the moves for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 All the members of the Federation of Korean National Economic Workers in China will make every possible effort to develop the inter-Korean relations and achieve peace and prosperity, keeping pace with the people in the homeland, it stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Media Slammed for Inciting Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Media Slammed for Inciting Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative media are speaking ill of the DPRK by taking the advantage of the north-south ties that have again plunged into a deadlock.
					 Denouncing the media for inflaming the tensions, a commentary of Rodong Sinmun Thursday says:
					
					 The Yonhap News found fault with every word mentioned by the spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a statement clarifying the DPRK's strong stand and just measure. It urged the present south Korean authorities to maintain the principle of original policy toward the north and strongly provide against possible provocations by the north, inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen. The KBS made such coarse invectives that the north took the measure in a calculation to take the initiative in the south-north dialogue. It praised the puppet authorities for their strong will to maintain principled counteraction and talked rubbish about homework to be solved by the north.
					
					 This clearly indicates the sinister nature of the puppet conservative media that have been bent on disrupting the north-south relations, not pleased with their improvement.
					
					 At a crossroad of whether the north-south ties improve or collapse the media are abetting fratricidal confrontation. Clear is the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their moves. Herein lies the danger of the development.
					
					 The media should know that with no false smear campaign can they evade the responsibility for the prevailing situation nor calm down the nation's mounting desire for reunification.
					
					 The puppet conservative media of south Korea are rubbish that has to be thrown into the dustbin of history as they stand against national reconciliation and unity and the improvement of the north-south ties.

articles.title: Explosion Occurs in Taegu, S. Korea
articles.content:
Explosion Occurs in Taegu, S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- An explosion occurred in a store in Taegu of south Korea on Sept. 23, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 It left two persons dead and several others wounded.
					
					 Dozens of vehicles and buildings near it were destroyed.

articles.title: Korean in Russia Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Their Anti-Reunification Actions
articles.content:
Korean in Russia Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Their Anti-Reunification Actions
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Ri Chae Son, vice-chairperson of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, released a statement on Sept. 24 denouncing the south Korean puppet regime for its crimes against national reunification.
					 The regime is letting loose a whole string of sheer sophism intended to evade the blame for the bedeviled inter-Korean relations and shift the responsibility for the situation onto the north, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 As already known, it had an axe to grind for realizing its delaying tactics, vociferating about "north's tactics for preventing its isolation" at a time when the north-south dialogue began thanks to the broad-minded and magnanimous initiative and step taken by the DPRK for peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula. When issues are being settled one by one through dialogue, it seriously rattled the nerves of the dialogue partner, claiming that the achievements are the "fruition of its theory of principle" and "fruition of its pressure on the north".
					
					 It is fanning up the atmosphere of war and confrontation, hell-bent on the north-targeted war maneuvers and arms buildup. It, at the same time, fabricated the case of attempted rebellion and linked it with the north to intensify the fascist suppression of democratic figures who call for reconciliation, unity and reunification between the north and the south.
					
					 It is self-evident that normal dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south are impossible in such atmosphere.
					
					 The puppet group kicked off confrontation hysteria, letting loose of a string of vituperation when the DPRK showed magnanimity and good will. It is becoming so shameless as to shift the blame for the grave situation caused by its reckless acts onto the north, far from making an apology for it.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly want the improved inter-Korean relations and the reunion of separated families and their relatives, they should reflect on their wrongdoings and discontinue such hysteria for confrontation.

articles.title: Russian Paper Marks DPRK's 65th Anniversary
articles.content:
Russian Paper Marks DPRK's 65th Anniversary
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The 33rd issue of the Russian newspaper Patriot carried a special article titled "State and revolution" illustrated with photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 It said:
					
					 The DPRK was founded by the great leader Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years and regarded believing in people as in Heaven as his motto and put forward the popular masses as a strong driving force in the revolutionary struggle. 
					
					 He founded the Juche idea, a new revolutionary idea, confident that the popular masses have inexhaustible strength. 
					
					 The Juche idea has been developed in depth at every stage of the revolutionary struggle. 
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its vitality and invincible power. It is because that the scientific Juche idea and behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, which give confidence in victory to the people even under the hardest conditions, have always served as a basis for the nation-building.
					
					 The DPRK is advancing in reliance upon the creative energy of the popular masses. 
					
					 The state plans and organization of any action for solving all issues arising in social construction are blended with the people's independent stand and creative ingenuity. 
					
					 The DPRK has as ever held fast to its Juche-oriented line.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Works Posted on Websites by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Works Posted on Websites by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea separately posted President Kim Il Sung's works on their websites on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The works were "The DPRK Represents Genuine People's Power and Is a Banner of the Unity and Solidarity of the Masses" and "Preventing War and Preserving Peace Are the Burning Tasks of Mankind".
					
					 The first work published on September 9, Juche 72 (1983) clarifies the significance of the founding of the DPRK, the tasks for increasing its might and achieving prosperity, the three principles of national reunification and the ways for carrying them out, the independent and peace-loving foreign policy of the DPRK government and the tasks for realizing global independence.
					
					 The second work published on September 6, Juche 75 (1986), deals with the importance of the principled issues of defusing the tension and the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Suk Commemorated in Peru
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Suk Commemorated in Peru
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru issued a special bulletin on Sept. 20 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the death of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The bulletin said in an article illustrated with her portrait:
					
					 Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru has the pleasure to issue this special bulletin to mark the 64th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of Mt. Paektu, in memory of her undying exploits performed for the victory in the anti-Japanese armed struggle, the development of the women's liberation movement and the building of a new society in Korea.
					
					 One of her greatest exploits was that she brought up the bright star of Mt. Paektu, making a great contribution to the succession to the Korean revolution, the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 She set a good example in devotedly protecting the leader during her life and devoted herself to the development of the women's movement and the building of a new country.
					
					 Her exploits will always be remembered along with the august names of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 She is always alive in the hearts of progressive women in Peru and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones del rey marrueco
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones del rey marrueco
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el 31 de agosto el rey de Marruecos, Mohamed VI.
					El mensaje senala:
					
					Con motivo del dia de fundacion de vuestro pais, envio mi saludo a Su Excelencia con el placer de desear de todo corazon al pueblo coreano el progreso y prosperidad continuos.
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi consideracion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensajes de felicitacion provenientes de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensajes de felicitacion provenientes de varios paises
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio los mensajes y cartas de felicitacion que le enviaran las personalidades de varios paises del mundo con motivo del 53o aniversario del inicio de la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun y del 68o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea.
					Entre ellas figuran el presidente del Consejo Supremo del Partido Socialista de Rumania, el presidente de la Union Socialista de Rumania, el primer secretario del Comite Central del Partido de Trabajadores Comunistas de Belarus y el presidente del Partido Socialista de Benin.
					
					Otros remitentes son el miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Nepal (Maoista), el subsecretario general del Partido de Coalicion Islamica de Iran, el secretario del Comite Central del  Partido Comunista Bolchevique de Toda la Union, el subsecretario general del Congreso Nacional Democratico de Ghana, el director general del Instituto Regional Asiatico de la Idea Juche, el director de la Sociedad Europea para el Estudio de la Idea Juche, el secretario general del Comite Internacional de Enlace por la Reunificacion y la Paz en Corea (CIERECO) y otras personalidades de alto rango de los circulos politico, social y economico de Rusia, Nepal, Malasia, Pakistan, Kazajstan, Iran, India, Japon, Noruega, Rumania, Bulgaria, Belarus, Suiza, Suecia, Francia, Gran Bretana y Nigeria y los delegados de las organizaciones internacionales, las de estudio de la idea Juche, las entidades de apoyo a la reunificacion y de amistad con Corea.
					
					En las misivas, ellos senalaron que brillaran eternamente las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien cumplio la historica causa de liberacion de la patria al conducir a la victoria la gran guerra antijaponesa y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien hizo aporte inmortal a la prosperidad del pais.
					
					Subrayaron que la imagen con amplia sonrisa del Dirigente, quien llevo al plano cimero la dignidad y el poderio nacional de la Corea del Juche mediante su original direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, esta siempre presente en el corazon de la humanidad junto con el Dia del Songun (25 de agosto).
					
					Expresaron la conviccion de que habran siempre victorias y glorias en el camino del pueblo coreano guiado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, otro general insigne.

articles.title: ACNC comenta humanitarismo fingido de conservadores surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC comenta humanitarismo fingido de conservadores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Despues de aplazado el encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados en el Norte y el Sur de Corea, los titeres surcoreanos se hacen de repente "angeles de humanitarismo".
					Ellos censuran a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea diciendo que esta intenta lograr la reanudacion del turismo al monte Kumgang usando como carta el asunto del encuentro de familiares y parientes separados.
					
					Al criticar la justa medida de la RPDC de dilatar esa cita, la describen como "acto que corta las relaciones entre familiares y parientes" y realizan la enganosa "visita de consuelo" a estos.
					
					Esta demagogia parte del objetivo de desvirtuar la justeza de la medida de la RPDC y justificar su crimen de haber impedido el avance de las relaciones intercoreanas enganando la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					El encuentro arriba mencionado se ha aplazado porque los esfuerzos de la RPDC por la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y su voluntad de dialogo se malemplean en los fines de confrontacion fratricida por parte de las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					Es absurdo que la banda de conservadores surcoreanos hable del humanitarismo.
					
					Historicamente, esta labor N-S se ha logrado gracias a las iniciativas y esfuerzos protagonicos de la RPDC.
					
					Las labores humanitarias realizadas hasta ahora en el Sur de Corea se lograron en su mayoria por las entidades civiles y los empresarios individuales.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas estuvieron siempre disgustadas de esas labores hablando de mantener los supuestos "principios".
					
					Los acuerdos bilaterales de esa materia, inclusive el encuentro en cuestion, se deben enteramente a los esfuerzos protagonicos de la RPDC.
					
					?Como era la situacion de junio expirado cuando la RPDC planteo las conversaciones entre las autoridades N-S sobre la normalizacion de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong, la reanudacion del turismo al monte Kumgang, el encuentro de las familiares y parientes separados?
					
					Entonces, las fuerzas anti-reunificacion dentro y fuera del pais pisoteaban los patrimonios de la era del 15 de Junio mientras la banda titere del Sur de Corea negaba totalmente las propuestas de la RPDC de crear el ambiente a favor del mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas al auspiciar el acto conjunto nacional del 15 de Junio, recurriendo al secuestro y rapto de los jovenes y ninos norcoreanos.
					
					Sin embargo, sin hacer caso de ello, la RPDC impulso el dialogo entre autoridades del Norte y el Sur, en que se incluyeron el encuentro y otros problemas humanitarios, y resolvio un paquete de los problemas presentados por la parte Sur.
					
					Pero, la camarilla surcoreana se aferraba a la tactica dilatoria diciendo que debe solucionar caso por caso las "enredadas" relaciones N-S.
					
					Y sobre los resultados de las conversaciones entre el Norte y el Sur preparadas al cabo de tantos esfuerzos, dijo que son "frutos del proceso de confianza de la Peninsula Coreana" y "de su doctrina de mantenimiento de principios", insultando a su interlocutor. Ademas, desarrollo los ejercicios de "ataque mas alla de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar" y "nombro" atrevidamente a los gobernadores de las provincias de la RPDC ofendiendo la maxima dignidad de esta.
					
					En fin de cuentas, es precisamente la banda titere del Sur de Corea que al abusar de las conversaciones del Norte y el Sur para los fines de confrontacion, impide la reconciliacion y la cooperacion entre ambas partes coreanas fomentando el enfrentamiento entre los regimenes del Norte y el Sur.
					
					Los elementos conflictivos no pueden evitar la responsabilidad del presente incidente.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia campana mediatica anti-RPDC en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia campana mediatica anti-RPDC en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En un comentario individual divulgado este jueves, el diario Rodong Sinmun denuncia a los medios conservadores surcoreanos que agravan la situacion acusando a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en estos tiempos en que cayeron en la crisis las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					Yonhap News calumnio la posicion resuelta y las medidas justas aclaradas por la RPDC a traves de la declaracion del portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria y agito la confrontacion fratricida insistiendo en que las autoridades actuales "deben mantener hasta el final el principio de la politica sobre el Norte establecido inicialmente" y "tomar medidas frente a la posibilidad de provocacion brusca del Norte de Corea". 
					
					En tanto, KBS alabo a las autoridades surcoreanas diciendo que ellas "tienen la firme voluntad de mantener los principios" y califico las medidas de las RPDC como "ideas para tomar control en el dialogo Sur-Norte" y "tareas que deben cumplir los mismos norcoreanos". 
					
					Esas versiones demuestran una vez mas la naturaleza conflictiva de los medios conservadores surcoreanos que tratan de romper a toda costa las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					En estos momentos en que las relaciones intercoreanas se encuentran en el dilema de mejora o ruptura, esos medios agitan la confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					Ellos deben darse cuenta de que con la demagogia, no pueden eludir la responsabilidad de la situacion dada ni sofocar la aspiracion nacional a la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Hay que eliminarlos lo mas pronto posible para la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y el mejoramiento de los vinculos N-S.

articles.title: Son incompatibles el dialogo y la guerra, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Son incompatibles el dialogo y la guerra, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este jueves, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que si bien la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se esforzara mucho por desarrollar las relaciones con el Sur de Corea, no dialogara con los que se obstinan en atacarla con fuerzas armadas, y continua:
					Aunque las autoridades surcoreanas hablan mucho del "dialogo", detras de la cortina recurren a los complots y los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Los belicistas titeres surcoreanos libraron en agosto pasado junto con Estados Unidos los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran envergadura "Ulji Freedom Guardian".
					
					En plenos dias de esa maniobra, realizaron el entrenamiento de ataque nuclear contra la RPDC introduciendo los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares B-52H.
					
					El ministro de Defensa Nacional Kim Kwan Jin y otros belicistas surcoreanos acusaron a la RPDC diciendo que hay antecedente de la provocacion del Norte (de Corea) aun en el tiempo de dialogo e insistiendo en la "amenaza de armas nucleares y misiles norcoreanos".
					
					Puesto que la banda surcoreana agrava ahora intencionalmente la tension interpretando mal la paciencia de la RPDC y malempleando el dialogo N-S en la provocacion militar, resulta imposible la marcha exitosa de dialogo y cooperacion entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					La realidad comprueba que las autoridades surcoreanas son totalmente responsables de la grave situacion actual.
					
					Si ellas continuan con su campana de enfrentamiento anti-RPDC desoyendo la advertencia de esta, las relaciones intercoreanas se empeoraran mas y la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana se veran mas amenazadas.
